COPING_C01_DESC: Analyzes threats and formulates specific action plans.
COPING_C01_EFFECT: Increases stress recovery speed. Activates only in controllable situations.
COPING_C02_DESC: Actively seeks resources, information, and assistance from others.
COPING_C02_EFFECT: Stress relief proportional to social network size.
COPING_C03_DESC: Regulates emotions through empathy and comfort from others.
COPING_C03_EFFECT: Reduces chronic stress when interacting with highly empathetic agents.
COPING_C04_DESC: Reinterprets the situation from a different perspective to reduce threat perception.
COPING_C05_DESC: Refuses to acknowledge the existence of a threat.
COPING_C05_EFFECT: Immediate stress relief. Hidden threat returns at 1.5x after 72 ticks.
COPING_C06_EFFECT: Reduces GAS energy consumption by 40%. Optimal in uncontrollable situations.
COPING_C07_DESC: Uses humor to relieve tension and spread positivity.
COPING_C07_EFFECT: Immediate stress reduction. Slight morale boost to nearby agents.
COPING_C08_DESC: Understands the situation in a broader context through meaning-making.
COPING_C08_EFFECT: Reduces chronic load accumulation rate. Bonus near ritual sites.
COPING_C09_DESC: Expresses emotions rather than suppressing them.
COPING_C09_EFFECT: Immediate GAS recovery. Side effect: spreads negative emotion to nearby agents.
COPING_C09_MALADAPTIVE_WARNING: Mixed: Risk of spreading stress to the group.
COPING_C10_DESC: Redirects attention to other activities to temporarily block threat processing.
COPING_C10_EFFECT: Blocks 70% of threat processing (24 ticks). Specialized for short-term stress.
COPING_C11_DESC: Gives up goals and stops resisting.
COPING_C11_EFFECT: Immediately stops GAS consumption. Collapses productivity. Helplessness accumulates.
COPING_C11_MALADAPTIVE_WARNING: Maladaptive: Permanently reduces sense of control through learned helplessness.
COPING_C12_EFFECT: Early stage: skill improvement. After mastery: depression accumulates.
COPING_C12_MALADAPTIVE_WARNING: Mixed: Turns toxic when proficiency exceeds 0.5.
COPING_C13_DESC: Immediately blocks stress using substances (alcohol, etc.).
COPING_C13_EFFECT: Powerful immediate relief. Rebound after 12 ticks. Dependency accumulates.
COPING_C13_MALADAPTIVE_WARNING: Maladaptive: Consumes substance resources. Collapse during withdrawal.
COPING_C14_EFFECT: Early: slight insight. After mastery: sleep disorder, deepening depression.
COPING_C14_MALADAPTIVE_WARNING: Mixed: Switches to brooding mode when proficiency exceeds 0.5.
COPING_C15_DESC: Takes action to directly solve problems.
COPING_C15_EFFECT: Enhances AI planning depth. Large recovery on goal achievement.
